alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Perry; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 25 at 7:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Tuscaloosa, north central Perry and southwestern Bibb Counties through 815 PM CDT... At 745 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles southeast of Shelton State Community College to near Low Gap to near Heiberger. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Southeastern Tuscaloosa, Brent, Brookwood, Coaling, Vance, Lake Wildwood, Deerlick Creek Campgrounds, Low Gap, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Eoline, Fleetwood, Cottondale, Camp Horne B.S.A., Peterson, Hagler, Duncanville, Pearson, Harmon, I 20 Rest Area Near Tuscaloosa and Ellards. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
